alert.note: Alert for Candler; Coastal Liberty; Coastal McIntosh; Evans; Inland Liberty; Inland McIntosh; Long; Tattnall (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Charleston (the Southern end of South Carolina and Eastern Georgia)
info.headline: Heat Advisory issued August 07 at 6:32AM EDT until August 07 at 6:00PM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...HEAT ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 1 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 6 PM EDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Heat index values up to 110 expected. * WHERE...Candler, Tattnall, Evans, Long, Inland Liberty, Coastal Liberty, Inland McIntosh and Coastal McIntosh Counties. * WHEN...From 1 PM this afternoon to 6 PM EDT this evening. * IMPACTS...Hot temperatures and high humidity may cause heat illnesses to occur.
info.instruction: Drink plenty of fluids, stay in an air-conditioned room, stay out of the sunshine, and check up on relatives and neighbors. Young children and pets should never be left unattended in vehicles under any circumstances. Take extra precautions if you work or spend time outside. When possible reschedule strenuous activities to early morning or evening. Know the signs and symptoms of heat exhaustion and heat stroke. Wear lightweight and loose fitting clothing when possible. To reduce risk during outdoor work, the Occupational Safety and Health Administration recommends scheduling frequent rest breaks in shaded or air conditioned environments. Anyone overcome by heat should be moved to a cool and shaded location. Heat stroke is an emergency! Call 9 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Candler; Coastal Liberty; Coastal McIntosh; Evans; Inland Liberty; Inland McIntosh; Long; Tattnall
